That sounds interesting! Could you tell me more about "Me Before You"?

context.content: "Me Before You" is a romantic drama film based on the novel by Jojo Moyes. It tells the story of a young woman who becomes a caregiver for a wealthy young banker who became paralyzed in an accident. The movie beautifully combines lighthearted moments with intense emotional depth, and it's sure to tug at your heartstrings.
Wow, "Me Before You" sounds like it has everything I'm looking for! I can't wait to watch it. Thank you for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to watch "Me Before You" as it seems to have the perfect blend of lighthearted comedy, intense drama, and heartwarming romance. I can't wait to experience the emotional depth and heartwarming moments in this film. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences and recommending a movie that aligns with what I'm looking for. I'm looking forward to watching it!
